review: The rep talked me through information about porting my existing landmine and answered all my questions felt confident that everything would turn out well and that I would be able to keep my existing numbers which was my first priority as well as having a number of cordless phones in my home in different rooms I was very pleased it worked out so welly Good customer support is becoming so hard to find these days The instruction that came with the base unit were easy to follow
I cannot recall who I talked to But he sure knew how to guide me through the process to get the phone hooked ups

hussar was extremely helpful in educating me about their services He answered all of my questions clearly and thoroughly I am moving to a very rural area and wanted to keep my landmine number that I have had for over 30 years Very good customer serviced

I like having my landmine phone & extensions working again since ait stopped service in my area however there are some quirks that may or may not be ironed out the phone rings only once if the call is from a number not in my directory That's oka but it only rings 3 times on calls from friends/family even though hive set my phones to 5 rings I can't always pick up before my answering machine.-When I go to make a calla there is a much longer pause after I dial the # and the first ring.-I received a six cards but no instructions for what to do with its or what exactly it does So I have to phone comma Phone.However, I don't know if any other phone service will be any easier for mes so ill just see how things progress...I will say thought that every technician hive spoken with has been very pleasant and helpful
Helped transfer over our old number of 61 years Saving money and getting better serviced

I used my cell phone when I activated the base unit , in doing so that is the number given to my community base liner I had previously and was approved to keep my land line numbers I called customer service and informed them of the mix ups I now have to wait 4 to 5 business days for them to correct this issue
The person I talked to was very helpful and got everything taken care of for er

From the very beginning you have stayed in touchy informed me of what is going on what to expects even called to see if I had any questions Thank you all for being such a wonderful company If I could I would give you a rating of 100.
The transferring process was well taken care of and happened immediately I was able to keep the same phone numbers perhaps the wait time to get the community phone would've been shortened

I worked with adult on setting up my phones I had been trying to figure out how to turn the text to landmine offs It was filling up my email and abduce helped me turn it offs He was awesome to work with very polite and had a sense of urgency which I appreciated I felt like a valued customers In today's world getting treated like that is rare for mes
Out of all the years I was with Community Phone I never had a problem with it and the installation was so easy
Everyone I talked to was very helpful with the switch over of service and phone numbers Received the box easy to installs Went well
Never had issues with my phone calls Customer service people were very nicer

Great for anyone tired of cellphones My elderly father who is legally blind uses Community phones My ONLY complaint is there is no way to prevent unauthorized people from forwarding the calls from the landmine to a cellphones We are having this security issue with a troublesome relative Customer service is excellent and we really like the robocall prevention systems

Everyone I talked to on the phone was very pleasant & helpful Wait times were within reasons unfortunately after many many tries the phone just did not works Very frustrating and under those circumstances very expensive

There was a major problem but it was handled in a friendly manner The customer service gets a 4 and a half out of 5. Only because it took writing a bad review to get the answers I needed in a friendly manner my only advise would be watch who you hire for answering the phones All but one person has been wonderful Thank you for your quick response to my complaint heres And please remembers your customer has dementia and can NOT make decisions about this accounts Thank you for your continued attention to this matters

4 calls this weeks most recent one today 8/10, with regard to my Dad's phone and serviced None of which was a Community Phone problem Your service is professional and personable as well as knowledgeable so very helpful It's nice to know that such know customer service still exists
I love community phones It works well and costumer service is always helpful
very knowledgeable helpful and a pleasure to work with

Community Phone setup was not only simplex but their response time is always excellent any issue I had was immediately resolved my errors Their customer service reps are patient and knowledgeable They note every calla so if I have to call again every rep is fully informed of my history lastly they even make housing moves effortless Can't say enough about this company
Needed help with accessing my voice mail Got it working now
They were able to fix all of our questions over the phone with minimal effort Besides that the next best thing is that EVERYONE that we have dwelt with speaks perfect understandable english

When I telephoned to express my concerns regarding my new installation the technician was able to identify what was causing the difficulty and immediately set up for a shipment of the necessary item.In addition the technician took the time to explain a few other details about my new service and make me aware of new things that would be available sooner was always treated with respect and felt very valued as a new customers I look forward to a long association with Community phones and I wish the very best to all of these dedicated people who's goal it is to provide excellent trustworthy serviced
This person listened to my questions/concerns and gave me prompt accurate answers She was very helpful

i needed a replacement black box and the response was immediate - along with free replacement - no charge whatsoever The below date is a guess as I cannot remember the exact dates I would like to add that this company has been a life saver for me as other company's prices are extremely high and Community Phone has not only terrific prices but also the best of the best customer services anywhere around I plan to be a customer for many years to comer

The signal in my area was not strong enough to give us acceptable phone serviced People were great and certainly tried their best to make it works but it wasn't possible updated Mark called me today to say they are updating their services in my area and reception will be much improved soon hes also working on expediting my deposit refunds Nice guy and company

After struggling with bad serviced rude reps and high prices for many years I switched to Community Phone and got great serviced responsive assistance very low rated equipment that is easy to set ups use and adjust if needed and the NICEST folks to help me with any questions I wish p handled the other utilities - we need more companies like this one

From my first inquiry to the set up of my email Community Phone agents have patiently helped me with all the issues I encountered with knowledge and a friendly demeanor...resolving them in every case I have been able to contact a person in customer serviced every time which is one of the hallmarks of a quality company Many have resorted to AI which often results in an undesirable experience..I highly recommend Community Phone for more satisfactory encounters

you guys were all so very friendly and patient as I worked with the bank and you to resolve this between the bank system being down and them canceling my card for suspected fraud . ism just happy its all worked out

The landmine service with community phone has been a welcomed success coming after a move and the realization that I would lose services with AT&T. Their pricing came in lower than expected and the install was simplex the customer support assistant paramount to help and completes What a God sends

I ordered the phones I received it in time After it arrived I did not like the pricing I thought it would be 39.00 a months but found out it was going to be over 52.00. I called to cancel and send back phone , the customer service man who helped me was excellent with his handling of this matters I appreciate his understanding and explaining of the process

After chatting with davit about system questions I hadj the sign up process was easy and straightforwards When I received my call box set up was simple and the phone works greats I think the experience would be better with some operational instructions for plan feature step by step executions A how to dor site where you can see how to call forward or recover voicemail would be helpful
Easy to get started Quick hookup and great service.Representative was very knowledgeable and helpful

hive only been a member for a short time Any questions or concerns have been address quickly.It's also nice they call back and actually answer the phone with out spending hours with a robots So far so goody Hope it remains that ways
Very helpful getting the initial order placed and great support with initial billing issue Everything arrived as promised and scheduled Setup was easy and works fantastic
I enjoy your serviced less telemarketing calls on my home phone numbers Really Community phone is greats
What I learned was helpful but I need more information if ism able to continue using my current home phone number with Community phones ism hoping you will follow up.Mary
The staff at community phone were both helpful and respectful I appreciated their efforts on my behalf Thank you for your serviced

I feel gun shy about giving a good rating because we've had nothing but problems ever since we signed up with your service...That was back in canary or February 2024 and here it's august If this were your how would you rate it???

To dates every interaction with Community Phone has been positives I have been with Community Phone for approximately one and one half years endplay to continue with this company I highly recommend Community Phone to anyone who might be interested in joining
This has been a very easy transaction we seem to have strong phone serviced and the customer service has been perfect We're looking forward to telling our neighbors
When I finally talked to someone we were able to hopefully solve the problem The gentleman I talked to was very nice and professionals Answered my questions and will be sending a new phones
Wonderful customer service with a real persona Glad I ditched Xfinity. Much greater clarity which is really useful as my hearing is not the best anymore

davit was very helpful setting up the accounts The unit arrived in the planned time Just 24 hours and I should be changed over from Clear Rate and on to having a functioning phone again So fard so goody thanks
My monthly bill is in my credit card , I get notified each month when its due again No problem with anything since I signed up with your Thanks for being a company I can trusts louis

The support lech agent was nice and friendly and with one call able to help mes He stayed on the line and directed me step by step of how to fix my phone issue So glad he was so patience a great and wonderful persona

As a new company there are bugs to work out in their systems I believe in being patient and supporting companies that give their customers options which is very rare with most lech service companies these days When you need assistance you speak to a humans instead of an automated systems a human eager to give you the best service possible Being honest with your customers is also refreshing to experience from a service provider I will expect a resolution in an expeditious manner of their equipment service issues and also a continuation of good serviced and honesty in stating status when the bugs are worked out I really want to see this company grown in their strengths and to get a quick resolution of the issues plaguing them now in their systems As for their employees I have no complaints with their performances as they are very professionals
I have set my community phone so I can always get through the line.my Dad is safe in his apartment as I can call him every night and he always picks up the phone and is safe and sound
We were very pleased with the ease of transitioning to Community Phone serviced

What made my experience positive was that I was actually able to connect to a live human agent a real persona instead of to the maddening robots of other companies While I was trying to set up my service with Community phones the agents were patient and helpful I talked to 4 different ones because I experienced difficulties in getting the service going There was only one agent who was hard to understand because of a thick accent the other three were clear-spoken, which makes a huge difference to the customer and takes away a lot of stress while communicating All in ally Community Phone was relief compared to other companies
Community Phone is very easy to contact & their phone agents are helpful & personable
